title: Civil War Recruitment poster - supporting claim

content.question: By urging African Americans to “silence the tongue of calumny [slander]” and warning them that if they “fail now...our race is doomed,” the poster was most likely making the claim that

choices.label: African Americans were previously unwilling to serve in the same units as white soldiers
white Union generals and politicians were not looking out for African Americans’ best interests
African American women should contribute more to the war effort
service in the war would be African Americans’ chance to prove that they were worthy of citizenship

content.answer: service in the war would be African Americans’ chance to prove that they were worthy of citizenship

topic.text: 2.23: The Civil War and Black Communities

skill.text: 2.A: Identify and explain a source's claim(s), evidence, and reasoning.
